summary: This mod adds three new restoration spells to the game: Apprentice Healing, Adept Healing, and Expert Healing. They are cast as long as the player holds down the activation button, much like the original novice healing spell (renamed to novice healing).
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds three new restoration spells to the game: Apprentice Healing, Adept Healing, and Expert Healing. They are cast as long as the player holds down the activation button, much like the original novice healing spell (renamed to novice healing).

***************************************
Spell list and effects:         
***************************************
1.) Apprentice Healing: restores 20 HP per second.
2.) Adept Healing: restores 40 HP per second.
3.) Expert Healing: restores 80 HP per second.

The spells are balanced in terms of cost and the tomes can be found with vendors or in the wild, depending on your level.
If you want to know the item IDs then open this mod in the creation kit and find out for yourself.
author: Gramob2
